channel.title: How make custom npc's?
channel.description: Alright well im on 508 based and im wondering how do i make npcs look like my in-game character? do i have to like model and stuff or what?

item.title: How make custom npc's?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:3, topic:342682”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=439084.msg3226755#msg3226755 date=1275658722]
wrong section; you will have to model it yourself.
[/quote]
He don’t have to model it forsay, he could just import a character model into the client, as a npc…but if he wanted it to look like his character, he would need to put all the armour part together:D[/quote]what does that mean?

Read full topic

item.title: How make custom npc's?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

pure2ownage:

wrong section; you will have to model it yourself.

He don’t have to model it forsay, he could just import a character model into the client, as a npc…but if he wanted it to look like his character, he would need to put all the armour part together:D

Read full topic
